summary: Changes the neck wound in game.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Better Decapitation Gore Texture by BeyondTom
Version: 1 Final
Date: 12/21/2011
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): BeyondTom

Description
===========
Changes the neck wound in game.

Details
=======
After unlocking the "decapitation" ability through the one handed tree I was thoroughly disappointed by the presentation so I decided I would breathe some new life into Bethesdaâ€™s texture.

This texture also goes well with Deadly Mutilation which can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34917

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\Skyrim\Data\
Here is an example of the file structure for the any new nexus members who are not quite used to mods yet:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\skyrim\Data
4. Enjoy your more visceral decapitations :P

Uninstall
=========
Simply remove the following files:
Data\textures\actors\character\gore\neckgorecap.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\gore\neckgorecap_n.dds

Incompatibility
===============
There should be no incompatibility with other mods.
This mod will work with Enhanced Blood Textures and Crimson Tide - Blood. Just make sure you put this in after.

History
=======
1.0, 12/21/2011 - Initial release (probably final).

Contact
=======
Feel free to send me a message through the forums.

Tools Used
==========
GIMP (with normal map plugin)- http://www.gimp.org/
normalmap - http://registry.gimp.org/node/69
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Winrar- http://www.rarlab.com/
author: BeyondTom
